text: Arthur Drewry, CBE (3 March 1891 â€“ 25 March 1961) was an English football administrator. He was the fifth President of FIFA from 1955 to 1961. He was also chairman of The Football Association and president of The Football League. ==References== Category:1891 births Category:1961 deaths Category:British military personnel of World War I Category:British businesspeople Category:Presidents of FIFA
title: Arthur Drewry
